paragraphs.title: 1.1) Hourly rainfall rate dataset importing from HUE
1.2) Hourly water level rate dataset importing from HUE
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit

waterLevelBKK001DF = spark.read.csv("/user/zeppelin/flooding_data/water_level_station_BKK001.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True).withColumn("station", lit("BKK001"))
waterLevelBKK003DF = spark.read.csv("/user/zeppelin/flooding_data/water_level_station_BKK003.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True).withColumn("station", lit("BKK003"))

paragraphs.title: 2.1) Data Preprocessing - Filter only Bangkok
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
#filter only "Bangkok" province and assign to valiable 'bangkokHourlyData'
bangkokHourlyData = hourlyData.filter(hourlyData['province_name_en']=="Bangkok").select(hourlyData['province_name_en'], hourlyData['district'], hourlyData['sub_district'], hourlyData['date'],  hourlyData['H01'], hourlyData['H02'], hourlyData['H03'], hourlyData['H04'], hourlyData['H05'], hourlyData['H06'], hourlyData['H07'], hourlyData['H08'], hourlyData['H09'], hourlyData['H10'], hourlyData['H11'], hourlyData['H12'], hourlyData['H13'], hourlyData['H14'], hourlyData['H15'], hourlyData['H16'], hourlyData['H17'], hourlyData['H18'], hourlyData['H19'], hourlyData['H20'], hourlyData['H21'], hourlyData['H22'], hourlyData['H23'], hourlyData['H24'])

paragraphs.title: 2.3) Missing value (Statistical value of known data) - Replace NULL with average rainy rate of each that day
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
def replaceNullWithAvg(row):
    avgRainyRate = getAvgRainyRateByLocationAndDate(row['district'], row['sub_district'], row['date'])
    return (
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H01']=="NULL" else row['H01']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H02']=="NULL" else row['H02']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H03']=="NULL" else row['H03']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H04']=="NULL" else row['H04']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H05']=="NULL" else row['H05']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H06']=="NULL" else row['H06']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H07']=="NULL" else row['H07']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H08']=="NULL" else row['H08']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H09']=="NULL" else row['H09']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H10']=="NULL" else row['H10']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H11']=="NULL" else row['H11']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H12']=="NULL" else row['H12']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H13']=="NULL" else row['H13']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H14']=="NULL" else row['H14']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H15']=="NULL" else row['H15']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H16']=="NULL" else row['H16']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H17']=="NULL" else row['H17']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H18']=="NULL" else row['H18']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H19']=="NULL" else row['H19']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H20']=="NULL" else row['H20']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H21']=="NULL" else row['H21']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H22']=="NULL" else row['H22']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H23']=="NULL" else row['H23']),
        float(avgRainyRate if row['H24']=="NULL" else row['H24'])
    )

def extract(row):
    rowDate = row['date']
    day = str(datetime.datetime.strptime(rowDate, "%d/%m/%Y").date().day)
    month = str(datetime.datetime.strptime(rowDate, "%d/%m/%Y").date().month)
    year = str(datetime.datetime.strptime(rowDate, "%d/%m/%Y").date().year)
    
    return (
        row['district'] + "/" + row['sub_district'], day, month, year, replaceNullWithAvg(row)
    )


cleanDF=bangkokHourlyData.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Location','Day','Month', 'Year', 'RainyRates'])

paragraphs.title: 2.4) Missing value - Check rainy rate since 01:00 till 24:00 should not be NULL
2.5) Preprocessing - Extract calendar column to day, month, year column on water-level dataset
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
import datetime
from pyspark.sql import Row

monthsArray = ["none", "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"]

def extract(row):
    rowDate = str(row['date'])[:10]
    day = str(datetime.datetime.strptime(rowDate, "%Y-%m-%d").date().day)
    month = int(datetime.datetime.strptime(rowDate, "%Y-%m-%d").date().month)
    year = str(datetime.datetime.strptime(rowDate, "%Y-%m-%d").date().year)
    
    return (
        row['station'], day, month, monthsArray[(month)], year, row['time'], float(row['water_lv'])
    )
   
waterLevelBKK001ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK001DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK003ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK003DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK004ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK004DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK005ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK005DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK008ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK008DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK009ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK009DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK020ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK020DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK021ExtractDF = waterLevelBKK021DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelCPY015ExtractDF = waterLevelCPY015DF.rdd.map(extract).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName','Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])

paragraphs.title: 2.6) Cleansing Data - Replease abnormal value -999 of water-level
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import Row

def replaseAbnormalWaterLevel(row):
    waterLv = row['WaterLavel'] 
    if float(row['WaterLavel'])==float(-999):
        waterLv = 0.0
    return (
        row['Station'], row['Day'], row['Month'] ,row['MonthName'], row['Year'], row['Time'], waterLv
    )

waterLevelBKK001CleanDF = waterLevelBKK001ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station', 'Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK003CleanDF = waterLevelBKK003ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK004CleanDF = waterLevelBKK004ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK005CleanDF = waterLevelBKK005ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK008CleanDF = waterLevelBKK008ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK009CleanDF = waterLevelBKK009ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK020CleanDF = waterLevelBKK020ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelBKK021CleanDF = waterLevelBKK021ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])
waterLevelCPY015CleanDF = waterLevelCPY015ExtractDF.rdd.map(replaseAbnormalWaterLevel).toDF(['Station','Day','Month', 'MonthName', 'Year', 'Time', 'WaterLavel'])

paragraphs.title: 3.1) Mapping - Finding summary and average rainy rate each that day
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

monthsArray = ["none", "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"]

def summaryRainyRate(row):
    summaryRate = 0.0
    hourRow = row['RainyRates']
    result = [row['Location'], row['Day'], str(row['Month']), monthsArray[int(row['Month'])], row['Year'], row['RainyRates'], ]
    for i in range(0, 23):
        summaryRate+=hourRow[i]
    result.append(round(float(summaryRate), 2))
    return result
    
summaryDF = cleanDF.rdd.map(summaryRainyRate).toDF(["Location","Day", "MonthNo", "MonthName" ,"Year","RainyRate", "DayRainyRate"]).sort('DayRainyRate', ascending=False)
summaryDF.show()

paragraphs.title: 4.2) Reduce - Find average of water-level dataset from 9 stations and union them all to one finally dataset.
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
def reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterlvDF):
    return waterlvDF.filter(waterlvDF['Year']=="2014").groupBy(["Station"]).pivot("Month").mean("WaterLavel")

waterLevelBKK001SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK001CleanDF)
waterLevelBKK003SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK003CleanDF)
waterLevelBKK004SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK004CleanDF)
waterLevelBKK005SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK005CleanDF)
waterLevelBKK008SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK008CleanDF)
waterLevelBKK009SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK009CleanDF)
waterLevelBKK020SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK020CleanDF)
waterLevelBKK021SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelBKK021CleanDF)
waterLevelCPY015SummaryDF = reduceCleanWaterLevelData(waterLevelCPY015CleanDF)

waterLevelFinalDF = waterLevelBKK001SummaryDF.union(waterLevelBKK003SummaryDF).union(waterLevelBKK004SummaryDF).union(waterLevelBKK005SummaryDF).union(waterLevelBKK008SummaryDF).union(waterLevelBKK009SummaryDF).union(waterLevelBKK020SummaryDF).union(waterLevelBKK021SummaryDF).union(waterLevelCPY015SummaryDF)
z.show(waterLevelFinalDF)

paragraphs.title: 5) Outlier Detection
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
import pyspark.sql.functions as F
from pyspark.sql.types import StringType

summaryDF = groupByMYDF.select("sum(DayRainyRate)").summary("min", "max", "25%", "75%", "mean", "stddev")
min = float(summaryDF.collect()[0][1])
max = float(summaryDF.collect()[1][1])
q1 = float(summaryDF.collect()[2][1])
q3 = float(summaryDF.collect()[3][1])
mean = float(summaryDF.collect()[4][1])
sd = float(summaryDF.collect()[5][1])
summaryDF.show()

iqr = q3-q1
upperB = q3+(1.5*iqr)
lowerB = q1-(1.5*iqr)
print "IQR: {}".format(iqr)
print "Upper Bound: {} / Lower Bound: {}".format(upperB, lowerB)

def checkBoundary(sumRate):
    if sumRate > upperB: 
        return 'upper bound'
    elif sumRate < lowerB:
        return 'lower bound'
    else :
        return 'normal'

checkBoundaryFunc = F.udf(checkBoundary, StringType())

OutlierDF = groupByMYDF.withColumn("Outlier", checkBoundaryFunc("sum(DayRainyRate)"))
z.show(OutlierDF)
